name: Every Brick Laid
description:
There's supposed to be a level here... right? I should be jumping and swinging through fun courses laid out by the designers, using a variety of fun tools and mechanics... but I don't see a level?

Do I have to make it all myself?

Controls

Move: WASD
Look: Mouse
Jump: Space
Place block: Left Click
Eat block: Right Click
Use block: E

Instructions

Collect shinies to unlock more blocks. Some blocks do something when you use them. Different blocks cost different amounts of energy. It's all on you.
